content:
by  Pitt News Staff April  

Youve heard of the Backyard Brawl the storied rivalry between Pitt and West Virginia Youve heard of the Backyard Brawl the storied rivalry between Pitt and West Virginia football PERIOD

But have you heard of the contest they call the Best in the Burgh

On Wednesday the tennis rivalry between Pitt and Duquesne boiled as the two city teams battled in their annual meeting PERIOD

The Panthers prevailed  on their senior day PERIOD

The two clubs which share the same home facility at Club  Life in Monroeville Pa. see the match as one of the biggest of the year PERIOD

Theres some pride that goes into this match Pitt coach George Dieffenbach said PERIOD

We always get up for it PERIOD They always get up for it PERIOD Its always close. the Dukes jumped out to a quick lead taking two of the three doubles contests to secure the matchs first point PERIOD

The lone Pitt victory in doubles came from seniors Carlie Smith and Leah Friedman who defeated Andrea Sailer and Alexandria Albano  coming back from a  deficit PERIOD

Duquesnes Zena Williams and Rebecca Poole trumped Pitts Sabrina Visram and Christie DAchille  in the second doubles match PERIOD

Alltime Pitt wins leader Kristy Borza and freshman Elizabeth Adams also fell  to Duquesnes Rachel McGowan and Johanna Bezjak PERIOD

But Borza whose serve was broken in the final game of her doubles match took responsibility on her shoulders to get her team back on track after falling behind dispatching Williams easily   in first singles PERIOD

I felt responsible for the doubles loss Borza said PERIOD I tried to win as quickly as possible and we were tied up real quick. the Panthers fell behind  when Visram lost to Bezjak   after blowing a  lead in the first set PERIOD

The Panthers who lost  against Duquesne last year tried to change the matchs pace PERIOD

At third singles Adams put away Poole with a routine   triumph PERIOD

With the match tied at two apiece the remaining matches were all pushed to a deciding set PERIOD

Smith gave Pitt the lead with a rousing comefrombehind win over Sailer    PERIOD

After Friedman dropped her match    to Kristen Swenson the entire Panthers squad rallied around DAchilles court to cheer her on PERIOD

It worked  it propelled the junior to a    win to clinch the match PERIOD

Borza accredited part of DAchilles win to the support PERIOD

Any time you have someone keeping you positive it definitely helps she said PERIOD

Dieffenbach and his crew were happy to get the win after such tight competition something they look forward to each year PERIOD

Its a very healthy rivalry PERIOD Each team wants very badly to win that match Dieffenbach said PERIOD

We look forward to this level of competition. borza was happy to see the singles players step up after falling behind early PERIOD

I cant believe we lost the doubles point and still came back with the win she said PERIOD

Its great for our team to win four singles matches. dieffenbach who is a Pitt alumnus and played for the mens team as a student was proud to see poise from his team PERIOD

Winning close matches is the sign of a seasoned veteran team he said PERIOD

After the match Dieffenbach lauded the careers of Smith and Friedman who have garnered  and  total wins respectively over the course of their careers PERIOD

Weve appreciated the hard work and good results over the past four years said Dieffenbach PERIOD

Thats a lot of wins. with the win the Panthers capped off an  record since spring break PERIOD

They now await seeding for the Big East Championships to be held at the University of South Florida in Tampa Fla PERIOD
